text: If I clone a folder that contains a template which references modules, will the cloned template reference the cloned modules, or will the cloned template reference the original modules?
whatever the answer, how can I see evidence of this fact in the Designer GUI?
Answered: it references the original modules :disappointed: edit module source from template view, and see which module name is "bolded" in the file manager
Followup question: How can I change my template to it references modules based on relative location?
I'm using the flexible template editor.. lets me drag and drop modules into a GUI grid
